PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FireSuppressionTerminalTypeHoseReel
PropertySetDef.Definition:
Definition from IAI: A supporting framework on which a hose may be wound (BS6100 155 8201).
Note that the service provided by the hose (water/foam) is determined by the context of the system onto which the hose reel is connected.

PropertyDef.Name: HoseReelType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined types of hose arrangement from which the type required may be set.

PropertyDef.Name: HoseReelMountingType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined types of hose reel mounting from which the type required may be set.

PropertyDef.Name: InletConnectionSize
PropertyDef.Definition: Size of the inlet connection to the hose reel.

PropertyDef.Name: HoseLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Notional length of the hose fitted to the hose reel when fully extended.

PropertyDef.Name: HoseNozzleType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined types of nozzle (in terms of spray pattern) fitted to the end of the hose from which the type required may be set.

PropertyDef.Name: ClassOfService
PropertyDef.Definition: A classification of usage of the hose reel that may be applied.

PropertyDef.Name: ClassificationAuthority
PropertyDef.Definition: The name of the authority that applies the classification of service to the hose reel (e.g. NFPA/FEMA)
